Articles.Content:
For those of you who don't know what a sign generator is, it's an online thing where you can make your own gas station sign, road sign, church billboard, etc. Getting a group of people together and see what they want the sign to say can be pretty interesting.

**DO NOT HOTLINK DIRECTLY FROM THE SITE! SAVE YOUR IMAGE AND UPLOAD IT TO ANOTHER SITE LIKE DROPBOX OR IMGUR, THEN PUT IT ON THE FORUM. HOTLINKING DOES NOT WORK!**

Here are some links to my favorite sign generator sites:

atom.smasher.org

[www.says-it.com](http://www.says-it.com)

Here is one I made just now:

![Gas-Station%20(1).jpg?_subject_uid=104116724&w=AABn6H1rLyaBtxh8gl3PRsQv5VkxMWrokjs0CXGwAG0Dng](https://dl-web.dropbox.com/get/Gas-Station%20(1).jpg?_subject_uid=104116724&w=AABn6H1rLyaBtxh8gl3PRsQv5VkxMWrokjs0CXGwAG0Dng)

Try it! I wanna see how interesting this can get ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Don't forget to rep anyone who makes a sign that makes you laugh!** ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/sy5qjLY.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/sy5qjLY.jpg)

Which I could see it.

Dang you, school blocking!
